name: vinay

idea: Pipa • Bella (www.pipabella.com) is a digital-first jewellery brand that offers India's modern women with a range of affordable and customizable jewellery priced under Rs. 5000 without a compromise on quality or design. 60% of the product mix is customizable, which means that the customer can create the product online based on her tastes and preferences and this product gets manufactured and shipped to the customer within 5-10 days. Our target customer is 85% women who live in Top 8 Metros. The business model boasts strong unit economics and a popular social media and fan following, with a growing user base of over 300,000 customers. The company recently closed two rounds with Fireside Ventures - a Pre-series A round of $1 million round in April 2018, and a follow on $670,000 round in December 2018. Previously in 2016, Pipa Bella has secured $600,000 in a seed/angel funding round led by LionRock Capital and angel investors Teru Sato, Rajesh Sawhney, Roopa Nath participated in the round.
name: PIPA BELLA ACCESSORIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: MULTITRACK SOLUTIONS doing advertising and marketing for television platform. Now also going to work for primary education solution for rural area.
name: Deepak Shetye

idea:
Eurja Infrastructure is a confluence of technical professionals providing a single window solution for establishing Solar PV power plant.

We have an experience of more than 30 projects from 6 kW to 1000kW with a total cumulative experience of 8 MW in last three years on Housing Society ,Individual Bungalow , Row Houses, Educational Institutes, Manufacturing Units ,Industrial units , Warehouse, Residential Societies ,Government establishment, factory, Office building, Social Sector establishment and others.

We are a Licensed Electrical Contractor in Maharashtra & Empaneled Channel Partner for CFA (Subsidy) Grid Connected Roof Top Project from MEDA. We undertake CAPEX & OPEX project's.

Some of the reputed patrons we have worked with are

Jharkhand State Cricket Association, MEETRA ( Govt. of Maharashtra) ,Godrej & Boyce , PROINSO , BSNL , SNDT, CRPF,POLYRUB, BORA AGRO , JSW Energy , Empire Plaza , Nirmal Lifestyle , AGE RCC energy , SURJA and more

To enable a successful installation we provide our customers all statutory approvals such as Custom Duty exemptions, Net metering approval, Electrical Inspector approval are undertook Eurja endorsing as a distinct Solar PV power solution provider.

Please visit www.eurja.com for further details.
name: Prashat Tiwari

idea:
Innovcare Lifesciences was incorporated with an objective of providing effective, high quality, innovative healthcare solutions backed with Research, Evidence and Results in the Nutraceutical, Cosmeceuticals and Functional Food category. Innovcare Lifesciences is involved in marketing and sales of branded nutraceuticals, cosmeceuticals and functional foods with an aim to protect and augment human health against various lifestyle-oriented diseases. In Innovcare we are committed to excellence with innovation, learning and agility. We believe in a systematic approach to whatever we do. We have systems and processes in place to ensure that every customer's requirements are thought through and delivered.

Basis above we are in the niche market of Nutraceuticals where we intend to provide medicine to enhance the effective of the regular medicine by acting as a catalyst. There are unique products in the Ortho and gynae division.

Further, the Company has a rich experience of over 100 Years of the founders and has an open environment to work in. The Company has been able to be among the top 50 Companies in the Nutraceuticals market of India which if currently at $5 Billion.
name: INNOVCARE LIFESCIENCES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are high performance technology consulting company
name: Ankit Agarwal

idea:
Dear Sir,

   We are hereby pleased to inform you that we are one of the Distributer & Stockiest of all types of industrial Valves, Flanges & Pipe Fittings in IBR & Non – IBR. These valves are designed and manufacture to confirm strictly to ASME, ANSI, API, BS, EN and other internationally recognized standards to meet the most stringent requirements for industrial valves.

K. K. Valves. was established in 2009. The company’s headquarter are located at Mumbai, Maharashtra state (India)..

OUR BRANDS / MAKE ARE - AUDCO INDIA LTD. & (L&T), KSB PUMPS LTD. (KSB), BHARAT HEAVY ELECTRICAL LTD. (BHEL), FORGES MARSHALL LTD. (SPIRAX), LEADER VALVES LTD., KIRLSOKER BROTHER LTD, SANT VALVES LTD., WJ, BDK, and many other brands also.

TYPES OF VALVES – BALL VALVE, GATE VALVE, GLOBE VALVE, SLUICE VALVE, STAINERS, BATTER FLY VALVE, PLUG VALVE, CHECK VALVE, STEAM TRAP, PIPE FITTING, BOILER MOUNTING, FLANGE, SAFETY RELIEF VALVE, TRAP, DIAPHARM VALVE, PISTON VALVE, PRESSURE REDUCING VALVE, special valve also as Per Your Requirements & Specification.

IN FOLLOWING MATERIAL – Cast Steel, Forge Steel, Mild Steel, Alloy Steel, ASTM 216 WCB, A 105, WC9, WC6, WC5, WC11, F-22, SS – 304, SS- 304L, SS – 316, SS – 316L and other also.

PRESSURE RATING & END CONNECTION – Socket weld, Screwed End, but weld, 150, 300, 600, 800, 900, 1500 & 2500 WITH IBR CERTIFICATE.

SIZE OF VALVES, FLANGES & PIPE FITTINGS - form ¼” to 36”, form ¼” to 12” in – Stock MUMBAI

We are hereby request you to kindly Register our Company name in you vendor list and forward your valuable requirement wherever its arises. Looking forward for your favorable response at your earliest and oblige.

Thanking you,

Yours very truly,

For K. K. Valves

Kasheenath (MOB- 9222224470)
name: KASHEENATH
